review: I received my fire stick today and it is very impressive.First, it was easy to install and put in operation. Secondly, the device is vey functional and downloads are very quick with little or no buffering. I am a prime member so I can assess more movies and listen to a variety of music for free.Lastly,  the stick is much better than Apple TV.The remote control fits in my hand very nicely and its range seems to be endless. I was outside in the driveway and was able to play and stop music.
